blogs.title: Fresher Pawri
blogs.body: We’ve got lots of things planned to make sure that you have a fantastic Freshers’ Week (which is in fact 3 weeks!) and settle into your new student life. With a whole range of exciting daytime and night-time events and activities, we’re sure that there is something for everyone. Keep your eyes peeled on our social media to find out about our Freshers’ Master Pass and Variety Pass, including act announcements. You can find our channels below. Passes and tickets will be available to buy from our Box Office tomorrow. You can also sign up to Union updates here.
blogs.author: Swarnab

blogs.title: Waves 2021
blogs.body: En voyage Uncharted Adventures. Waves is the annual cultural festival of BITS Pilani, K K Birla Goa Campus. It is a three-day-long festival held in the late October – early November period. It is a cultural festival that is held annually to celebrate music, dance and art. It is an inter college festival with students coming in to participate in events and competitions from across the country. With a footfall of over 40,000 recorded in recent editions, it is one of the leading college festivals in the country.
blogs.author: Erudite
